As xxxchromaticxxx says, if you have been invalidated on a prior install, this install & crack won't activate the software.

I uninstalled & manually removed all traces of the software from HDD and registry, but it still would not active after re-installing.

So the software must be leaving a fingerprint somewhere I haven't been able to find.

The answer for me was to install on another machine that had never seen the software before.


Version 6.5.3 is now out - I wonder if one clever dude will get it to work over a previous install :)
